data.title: Kassie DePaiva to Reprise 'One Life to Live' Character Blair Cramer on 'General Hospital'!
data.meta_description: Kassie DePaiva to Reprise ‘One Life to Live’ Character Blair Cramer on ‘General Hospital’! Kassie DePaiva's Blair Cramer is back in action.    The 62-year-old soap star will head to General Hospital's Port Charles as her One Life to Live alter-ego, ABC…
data.text:
Kassie DePaiva‘s Blair Cramer is back in action.

The 62-year-old soap star will head to General Hospital‘s Port Charles as her One Life to Live alter-ego, ABC revealed to TVLine.

Her appearance will begin airing in September, an ABC rep also confirmed to the outlet.

Keep reading to find out more…

This isn’t her first trip to the soap: In March 2012, just two months after One Life to Live ended its broadcast run on ABC, she starred as Blair in General Hospital for a multi-month crossover event that also featured Roger Howarth, also known as Todd Manning.

Earlier this month, Kassie, who recently returned to Days of Our Lives as Eve Donovan, discussed a possible return to General Hospital.

“There’s a lot of history there, a lot of time, a lot of water under that bridge, but I guess Todd is not Todd, right? So if I was to go back on that show, he probably wouldn’t recognize me. But I could go, ‘You’re hot. You look like somebody I used to know,’” she teased to Soap Opera Digest.
